Operation 'get_/jobs/health' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Current description is too generic and lacks actionable context. Missing information about what constitutes a healthy response and when an AI agent should call this endpoint. Enhanced description clarifies the purpose, expected response, and practical use case for AI agents.

data.current_description: This endpoint allows you to check the health of the Speech is Cheap Jobs API.
data.description_suggestion: Checks the operational health and availability of the Speech is Cheap Jobs API. Returns a 200 status code if the API is operational and ready to process transcription jobs. Use this endpoint to verify API connectivity before submitting transcription jobs.
data.reasoning: Current description is too generic and lacks actionable context. Missing information about what constitutes a healthy response and when an AI agent should call this endpoint. Enhanced description clarifies the purpose, expected response, and practical use case for AI agents.

message: Operation 'get_/jobs/{job_id}' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Current description lacks specificity about possible status values and output structure. Missing details about when results become available and required parameters. Enhanced description provides concrete status values, clarifies output availability conditions, and explicitly mentions the required job_id parameter for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: This endpoint allows you to check the status of an existing transcription job and retrieve its results if available.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the current status and transcription results for a specified job. Returns job metadata including status (pending, processing, completed, or failed) and the transcribed output with segments and word-level timing data when available. Results are only available after job processing completes. Requires the job_id path parameter.
data.reasoning: Current description lacks specificity about possible status values and output structure. Missing details about when results become available and required parameters. Enhanced description provides concrete status values, clarifies output availability conditions, and explicitly mentions the required job_id parameter for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'delete_/jobs/{job_id}' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_side_effects. Current description is too minimal and doesn't clarify state constraints or side effects. Missing information about which job states can be cancelled, what happens after cancellation, and authentication requirements. Enhanced description specifies cancellable states, clarifies irreversibility, mentions authentication requirement, and explains the operation's effects for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: This endpoint allows you to cancel a pending transcription job.
data.description_suggestion: Cancels a transcription job that is in pending or processing state. Once cancelled, the job cannot be resumed and no further processing will occur. Returns confirmation of cancellation. Only jobs in pending or processing states can be cancelled; completed or failed jobs cannot be cancelled. Requires the job_id path parameter and authentication.
data.reasoning: Current description is too minimal and doesn't clarify state constraints or side effects. Missing information about which job states can be cancelled, what happens after cancellation, and authentication requirements. Enhanced description specifies cancellable states, clarifies irreversibility, mentions authentication requirement, and explains the operation's effects for better AI agent decision-making.
